        @NotNull
public android.graphics.Bitmap binarizeBitmap(@NotNull

        Applies binarization filter to Bitmap. Old bitmap is recycled if stated.

        Parameters:
        bitmap - bitmap to binarize
        recycle - if the original bitmap should be recycled afterwards
        Returns:
